title: WHIRLING F1 / HARDIE AUTHORITY WC
description: THE WHITE CHECK TO GET TO KLAASJE

links.title: Authority: "As you look around this room full o..."
links.text: As you look around this room full of sweaty men, swearing, drinking, spitting out tobacco.... does this look familiar?

links.title: You: "Where have I seen this before?"
links.text: Where have I seen this before?

links.title: Authority: "You believe the place was called *P..."
links.text: You believe the place was called *Precinct 41* -- it was also filled with (almost exclusively) *men*, sitting on desks, talking shit and wasting time.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: ""You seen Apricot -- old Pidieu's d..."
links.text: "You seen Apricot -- old Pidieu's daughter?" asks Lieutentant McCoy. "Uh-huh," replies Torson. "The ass on that one..." McCoy shakes his head in appreciation. "A bit strange the old man named her Apricot, but, I mean -- who am I to judge? Wanna hit the kebab joint?"

links.title: You: ""I get it, Titus. You guys really a..."
links.text: "I get it, Titus. You guys really are *the authority* around here."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Huh?""
links.text: "Huh?"

links.title: You: ""You must be -- you're just like re..."
links.text: "You must be -- you're just like real cops. Drinking beer and sitting around with your dicks in your hand."

links.title: Titus Hardie: "He leans in. "You got a problem wit..."
links.text: He leans in. "You got a problem with *beer* now?"

links.title: Authority: "Not quite there yet -- push on."
links.text: Not quite there yet -- push on.

links.title: You: ""No, no. I'm drunk on the job too...."
links.text: "No, no. I'm drunk on the job too. I don't give a shit, just like you guys."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Speak for yourself, buddy." He put..."
links.text: "Speak for yourself, buddy." He puts the beer down. "We've been giving shit for *ten years*! Martinaise was a dump before we put this outfit together."

links.title: Eugene: ""They don't know, man. They weren't..."
links.text: "They don't know, man. They weren't here." He turns to you. "We had three shootings a week, kids dead, fuckin' graffito everywhere... You cops haven't shown up since the Thirties."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Congratulations on the graffito re..."
links.text: "Congratulations on the graffito removal." He turns to Titus. "All I see is you sitting around talking about *Monica's titties* -- while there's a rape victim."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""So what? What do you want from me?..."
links.text: "So what? What do you want from me? We took care of that fuck." He picks the beer back up.

links.title: Authority: "Don't let him drink that. One more..."
links.text: Don't let him drink that. One more push, quick!

links.title: Suggestion: "Just don't antagonize him, you have..."
links.text: Just don't antagonize him, you have this already.

links.title: You: ""It's not about who did it, it's ab..."
links.text: "It's not about who did it, it's about the victim. She needs help."

links.title: Elizabeth: ""Titus..." He looks at her."
links.text: "Titus..." He looks at her.

links.title: Authority: "She stops mid-sentence. That's it -..."
links.text: She stops mid-sentence. That's it -- you got him. He's going to give it up, but on his terms.

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""You wanna *help* her, cop? Fine, I..."
links.text: "You wanna *help* her, cop? Fine, I'm, gonna let you help her -- but you treat her with respect."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""If you don't -- if you *question*..."
links.text: "If you don't -- if you *question* her, harass her..." Titus taps his chin with his fist. "...a freight train of pain, buddy."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What is her name?" The lieutenant..."
links.text: "What is her name?" The lieutenant takes out his notes.

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Klaasje Amandou. She's staying her..."
links.text: "Klaasje Amandou. She's staying here at the Whirling-in-Rags. A real pretty one, silvery jumpsuit, blonde." Titus adjusts his cap. "That's Amandou with an O-U."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Shit! The girl... the girl upstairs..."
links.text: Shit! The girl... the girl upstairs?! That can't be her! Remember what you said to her? You told you wanna have...

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Oh, it's her. It's definitely her...."
links.text: Oh, it's her. It's definitely her. It's Miss Oranje Disco Dancer.

links.title: You: ""K-Klaasje?""
links.text: "K-Klaasje?"

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Yeah -- blonde. Tall. Two rooms ov..."
links.text: "Yeah -- blonde. Tall. Two rooms over from yours." He nods upstairs.

links.title: You: ""Miss Oranje Disco Dancer?""
links.text: "Miss Oranje Disco Dancer?"

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Sure -- why not. You've probably s..."
links.text: "Sure -- why not. You've probably seen her around." He nods upstairs.

links.title: You: ""Klaasje Amandou. Cool." (Keep your..."
links.text: "Klaasje Amandou. Cool." (Keep your cool.)

links.title: Composure: "You inexplicably add "cool" after t..."
links.text: You inexplicably add "cool" after the victim's name -- but no one notices. Your spine is too damn straight. None of these people would ever suspect you've met her.

links.title: Suggestion: "Whatever you do, do not to tell him..."
links.text: Whatever you do, do not to tell him you *know her*. That would sound *off*.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Calm. Normal. Try to forget this *l..."
links.text: Calm. Normal. Try to forget this *little hiccup*.

links.title: Composure: "You inexplicably add "cool" after t..."
links.text: You inexplicably add "cool" after the victim's name -- with your eyes bulging like some wild beast. Your fingers are fidgeting and sweat starts forming on your brow as Titus looks at you oddly.

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""I don't understand what's so cool..."
links.text: "I don't understand what's so cool here."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Nothing." He gives you a sideways..."
links.text: "Nothing." He gives you a sideways glance. "We just have a *few* more questions -- then we'll be on our way."

links.title: Endurance: "It sounds like you're having a hear..."
links.text: It sounds like you're having a heart attack -- whatever you said, it couldn't have been *that* bad. Please relax.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Shit! The girl... the girl upstairs..."
links.text: Shit! The girl... the girl upstairs?! That can't be her. She knows you drank so hard you forgot you were a cop...

links.title: You: ""What was her relationship with the..."
links.text: "What was her relationship with the mercenary?"

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Relationship?! There was no fuckin..."
links.text: "Relationship?! There was no fucking relationship! He raped her, that's their relationship!"

links.title: Empathy: "Something is off here. His anger is..."
links.text: Something is off here. His anger is... possessive.

links.title: Shanky: ""It was like that karaoke incident..."
links.text: "It was like that karaoke incident all over again. Or like some of the other girls he was harassing."

links.title: Elizabeth: ""Okay, enough. All of this is irrel..."
links.text: "Okay, enough. All of this is irrelevant to your stated investigation."

links.title: You: ""When did the rape happen?""
links.text: "When did the rape happen?"

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""He did it before we killed him. He..."
links.text: "He did it before we killed him. He's not gonna do it again." He crushes his half-empty beer can. "So what does it matter?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It would help if we establish a ti..."
links.text: "It would help if we establish a timeline."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Alright. Two weeks maybe? I don't..."
links.text: "Alright. Two weeks maybe? I don't know... I need another beer." He turns to Glen.

links.title: Glen: ""Here you go, boss!" The tall blond..."
links.text: "Here you go, boss!" The tall blond throws him a can. Titus cracks it open.

links.title: You: ""We could establish a timeline.""
links.text: "We could establish a timeline."

links.title: You: ""Alright.""
links.text: "Alright."

links.title: Glen: ""You don't have a beer in your hand..."
links.text: "You don't have a beer in your hand." The tall blond throws Titus a can. "Here you go!"

links.title: You: ""What is *your* relationship with h..."
links.text: "What is *your* relationship with her?"

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""I know her." He looks around and a..."
links.text: "I know her." He looks around and an uncommon silence fills the room.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""How well do you *know* her?""
links.text: "How well do you *know* her?"

links.title: Perception (Sight): "A small twitch in the corner of Kim..."
links.text: A small twitch in the corner of Kim's mouth. He has a hunch about what *knowing* means.

links.title: You: ""Okay. How well?""
links.text: "Okay. How well?"

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Well enough, copper. We partied. S..."
links.text: "Well enough, copper. We partied. She's been here for a few months." He crosses his arms.

links.title: Composure: "He tries to make it sound real casu..."
links.text: He tries to make it sound real casual -- but the muscles on his neck tighten.

links.title: You: ""So she's not from around here?""
links.text: "So she's not from around here?"

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""You mean Revachol? Nah. She's an i..."
links.text: "You mean Revachol? Nah. She's an immigrant or a drifter of some sort. Been staying here over the winter."

links.title: Fat Angus: ""Don't you give her any more troubl..."
links.text: "Don't you give her any more trouble!" the fat guy blurts out. "She's just had some bad luck, that's all."

links.title: Glen: ""Shut up, Angie!" He slaps his fore..."
links.text: "Shut up, Angie!" He slaps his forehead. "She doesn't need your help..."

links.title: Titus Hardie: "Titus gives them both a look. They..."
links.text: Titus gives them both a look. They fall silent.

links.title: Suggestion: "What's with all the silences? It's..."
links.text: What's with all the silences? It's like these guys don't know how to feel about this. You should keep picking at it...

links.title: Electrochemistry: "And what was up with the *partying*..."
links.text: And what was up with the *partying* she and Titus did? It sounded fun.

links.title: You: ""I see. Another question?""
links.text: "I see. Another question?"

links.title: Titus Hardie: "He rubs his left temple. "If you mu..."
links.text: He rubs his left temple. "If you must."

links.title: You: ""You said you partied. What did you..."
links.text: "You said you partied. What did you mean?"

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""What do you think I meant?""
links.text: "What do you think I meant?"

links.title: You: ""Sex?""
links.text: "Sex?"

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Yeah. Pretty much.""
links.text: "Yeah. Pretty much."

links.title: You: ""So you're saying the two of you we..."
links.text: "So you're saying the two of you were... close?"

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""No. We just fucked, that's all," h..."
links.text: "No. We just fucked, that's all," he states matter-of-factly. "I'm not gonna give you any details if that's what you're after. So put your dick away."

links.title: Suggestion: "He really went out of his way to se..."
links.text: He really went out of his way to seem comfortable with this topic. That's all you're gonna get for now.

links.title: Drama: "He's doing a good job here. A comme..."
links.text: He's doing a good job here. A commendable performance of *I don't give a shit*.

links.title: You: ""Another question.""
links.text: "Another question."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Goddamnit, get it over with alread..."
links.text: "Goddamnit, get it over with already..."

links.title: You: ""Drugs?""
links.text: "Drugs?"

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Yeah. We did them. What's that to..."
links.text: "Yeah. We did them. What's that to you?"

links.title: You: ""Karaoke?""
links.text: "Karaoke?"

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Yeah, tons of it. All the songs.""
links.text: "Yeah, tons of it. All the songs."

links.title: You: ""Sex, drugs, *and* karaoke?""
links.text: "Sex, drugs, *and* karaoke?"

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Yes -- yes -- and no." He looks yo..."
links.text: "Yes -- yes -- and no." He looks you straight in the eye. "Got something to say about it?"

links.title: You: ""I think I know her.""
links.text: "I think I know her."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""You don't know her.""
links.text: "You don't know her."

links.title: You: ""You're wrong, I do.""
links.text: "You're wrong, I do."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Not the way I do.""
links.text: "Not the way I do."

links.title: Suggestion: "Okay, this turned out better than e..."
links.text: Okay, this turned out better than expected.

links.title: You: ""You're right, I don't.""
links.text: "You're right, I don't."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Good boy.""
links.text: "Good boy."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: You: ""Thank you, we'll talk to her." (Co..."
links.text: "Thank you, we'll talk to her." (Conclude.)

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Remember what I said: freight trai..."
links.text: "Remember what I said: freight train of pain." He points his beer can at you.

links.title: You: ""Okay, enough about it then." (Conc..."
links.text: "Okay, enough about it then." (Conclude.)

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Yeah -- whatever.""
links.text: "Yeah -- whatever."

links.title: You: "(Nod.) "What is her name?""
links.text: (Nod.) "What is her name?"

links.title: You: ""Someone's been raped. She needs co..."
links.text: "Someone's been raped. She needs counselling -- we need to talk to her."

links.title: Elizabeth: ""Titus..." He looks at her."
links.text: "Titus..." He looks at her.

links.title: Authority: "She stops mid-sentence. That's it -..."
links.text: She stops mid-sentence. That's it -- you got him. He's going to give it up, but on his terms.

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""You wanna talk to her, cop? Fine...."
links.text: "You wanna talk to her, cop? Fine. I'm gonna let you talk to her. But you treat her with respect."

links.title: You: ""I've asked this before -- why are..."
links.text: "I've asked this before -- why are you hiding the victim?!"

links.title: Elizabeth: ""Titus is hiding nothing." She turn..."
links.text: "Titus is hiding nothing." She turns to the hulk of a man. "Titus..."

links.title: Titus Hardie: "He's too angry to drink. "You wanna..."
links.text: He's too angry to drink. "You wanna talk to her? Fine, talk to her! I got nothing to hide."

links.title: Drama: "Everybody has something to hide. He..."
links.text: Everybody has something to hide. He *certainly* does.

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""So long as you treat her with *res..."
links.text: "So long as you treat her with *respect*. No questioning, no harassing -- or you got the freight train of pain heading your way." He grinds his fist into his palm. "You understand?"

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Actually, the graffito isn't *quite..."
links.text: Actually, the graffito isn't *quite* off yet is it?

links.title: Suggestion: "What are you talking about? Don't s..."
links.text: What are you talking about? Don't say that, this is no time to nitpick.

links.title: You: ""You may have missed a spot there w..."
links.text: "You may have missed a spot there with the graffito."

links.title: Eugene: ""Man, I've been to Jamrock. The pla..."
links.text: "Man, I've been to Jamrock. The place looks like a modern painting. Kids as old as ten with guns on the street -- you got eight different mobs vying for power..."

links.title: You: ""Congratulations. All I see is you..."
links.text: "Congratulations. All I see is you sitting around talking about *Monica's titties* -- while there's a rape victim."

links.title: You: ""No, I'm also a big fan of beer --..."
links.text: "No, I'm also a big fan of beer -- *and* jerking off instead of helping people."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""You saying we don't *help* people?..."
links.text: "You saying we don't *help* people?" He puts the beer down. "I've been doing this job for *ten years*! Martinaise was a dump before we put this outfit together."

links.title: Eugene: ""They don't know, man -- they weren..."
links.text: "They don't know, man -- they weren't here." He turns to you. "We had three shootings a week, kids dead, fuckin' *graffito* everywhere -- you cops haven't shown up since the Thirties."

links.title: You: ""I have a beer-problem, but not a p..."
links.text: "I have a beer-problem, but not a problem with beer. I also have *no* idea how to do my job. Like you."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Speak for yourself, buddy." He put..."
links.text: "Speak for yourself, buddy." He puts the beer down. "I've been running this outfit for ten years now. You shoulda seen Martinaise *before* we started. It was like Jamrock now."

links.title: Eugene: ""They didn't see shit, man," he tur..."
links.text: "They didn't see shit, man," he turns to you. "Kids getting shot, we had three shootings a week, fuckin' graffito everywhere -- you cops haven't shown up since the Thirties."

links.title: Authority: "You have *so* many bad options rule..."
links.text: You have *so* many bad options ruled out it's *insane*! There is no way in the world you won't do it this time!

links.title: Authority: "This time it's going to work. You a..."
links.text: This time it's going to work. You already ruled out the first, *bad* option that didn't.

links.title: Authority: "Establish authority, yes! AUTHORITY..."
links.text: Establish authority, yes! AUTHORITY! Feverish thoughts race through your mind.

links.title: You: ""Let's try this again -- Kim, gimme..."
links.text: "Let's try this again -- Kim, gimme your gun."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No," he whispers, not even looking..."
links.text: "No," he whispers, not even looking at you. "Not going to happen."

links.title: You: ""First you tell me someone's been *..."
links.text: "First you tell me someone's been *raped*, and then you don't say *who*. That's bullshit!" (Stomp your feet.)

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Stop shitting your pants. You don'..."
links.text: "Stop shitting your pants. You don't *need* to know, alright? We took care of it."

links.title: Titus Hardie: "He repeats: "The *law* handled it,..."
links.text: He repeats: "The *law* handled it, alright?"

links.title: Eugene: ""Yeah, aren't you listening? It's d..."
links.text: "Yeah, aren't you listening? It's done. Finito!"

links.title: You: ""You're not the law. I am the law!""
links.text: "You're not the law. I am the law!"

links.title: Garte, the Cafeteria Manager: ""For god's sake, stop SHOUTING!" Th..."
links.text: "For god's sake, stop SHOUTING!" The man behind the counter shouts. "Stop crashing into people in my establishment! Stop provoking those oafs!"

links.title: Half Light: "Sounds like someone's dam broke."
links.text: Sounds like someone's dam broke.

links.title: Garte, the Cafeteria Manager: ""They're not going to give you *any..."
links.text: "They're not going to give you *anything*, can't you see?! I can't have a *police interrogation* in here. People are trying to eat..."

links.title: You: ""This doesn't concern you, cafeteri..."
links.text: "This doesn't concern you, cafeteria manager!"

links.title: Garte, the Cafeteria Manager: ""Of *course* it concerns me if you..."
links.text: "Of *course* it concerns me if you make this kind of..."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Easy, babes. What is this?" Titus..."
links.text: "Easy, babes. What is this?" Titus spreads his arms, smiling gently. "I can't have a slap-fight in my bar. It's embarrassing."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We are deep, *deep* in farce terri..."
links.text: "We are deep, *deep* in farce territory," the lieutenant whispers to you, taking a step closer to the door. "We need to cool off and re-engage, *later*."

links.title: Authority: "Everyone can see you picked some wr..."
links.text: Everyone can see you picked some wrong options. Next time you have to come up with better things to say.

links.title: You: ""Shut up, barman!""
links.text: "Shut up, barman!"

links.title: Garte, the Cafeteria Manager: ""What is your...?""
links.text: "What is your...?"

links.title: You: ""I'm gonna tear your stupid hairy h..."
links.text: "I'm gonna tear your stupid hairy head off, Garte!"

links.title: Garte, the Cafeteria Manager: ""Wait, *what*?!""
links.text: "Wait, *what*?!"

links.title: Garte, the Cafeteria Manager: ""For god's sake, stop SHOUTING!" Th..."
links.text: "For god's sake, stop SHOUTING!" The man behind the counter shouts. "Stop breaking things in my establishment! Stop provoking those oafs!"

links.title: You: ""I guess we're both the law around..."
links.text: "I guess we're both the law around here, if you start to think about it."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""No, asshole -- *you're* nobody. *I..."
links.text: "No, asshole -- *you're* nobody. *I'm* the law!"

links.title: Garte, the Cafeteria Manager: ""Stop yelling about the god damn la..."
links.text: "Stop yelling about the god damn law in my establishment!" the cafeteria manager interrupts with his voice raised to a squeak. "We get it, you're *all* the law!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's just all cool off," the lieu..."
links.text: "Let's just all cool off," the lieutenant says, trying to salvage the situation. "We had some questions, that's all."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Sheesh..." Titus wipes his brow. "..."
links.text: "Sheesh..." Titus wipes his brow. "Okay, we get it, no need to piss in my drink!" He lowers his voice. "I preferred Sylvie. What the fuck even happened to her?"

links.title: You: ""Maybe you're right. Maybe I'm not..."
links.text: "Maybe you're right. Maybe I'm not the law after all." (To yourself.)  "Maybe everyone's been lying to me..."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""What, now you're in some kind of *..."
links.text: "What, now you're in some kind of *personal crisis* -- right in front of us?" He seems taken aback by this sudden display of weakness. "Take this esoteric shit out of my bar!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I assure you, there is no crisis,"..."
links.text: "I assure you, there is no crisis," the lieutenant tries to salvage the situation. "We had questions, that's all."

links.title: Authority: "There is little left to salvage......"
links.text: There is little left to salvage... Did I not tell you to pick the *right* option?

links.title: You: ""I'm the only thing keeping this to..."
links.text: "I'm the only thing keeping this town from going to *hell* and you're not helping." (Point your finger.)

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""And what exactly is it you've been..."
links.text: "And what exactly is it you've been doing that's so god damn special -- shitting yourself in front of us?" He leans in. "Going around harassing kids on the street? Kids who've done nothing wrong?"

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""All the while talking racist shit..."
links.text: "All the while talking racist shit -- don't think we aren't watching, *fascha*. People here trust us. We're getting *complaints*."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "*Fascha* -- that's short for fascis..."
links.text: *Fascha* -- that's short for fascist.

links.title: You: ""I haven't said anything racist!""
links.text: "I haven't said anything racist!"

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Of course you have! You've been ca..."
links.text: "Of course you have! You've been calling people kipt left and right, inciting *race violence* in my town."

links.title: Eugene: ""Carly said they've been trying to..."
links.text: "Carly said they've been trying to set up a *race rally*, whatever the fuck that means. Trying to get the *kipts* out of Revachol, before the economy goes to shit..."

links.title: You: ""That's a lie! There is no 'race ra..."
links.text: "That's a lie! There is no 'race rally'!"

links.title: Eugene: ""Sure there is. Carly said they're..."
links.text: "Sure there is. Carly said they're bulk-purchasing confetti. Ribbons, too, and loudspeakers..." He shakes his head. "And *fireworks*! Carly works at a carnival shop, you see."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Get the fuck out of here, you raci..."
links.text: "Get the fuck out of here, you racist carnie." Titus points at the door. "There'll be no race rally in my town."

links.title: You: ""I'm not a racist. Just look at my..."
links.text: "I'm not a racist. Just look at my partner!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He's not racist and there is no ra..."
links.text: "He's not racist and there is no rally." He turns to you. "There is no Carly either, it's a joke. Let's move on -- or get some air."

links.title: Authority: "What happened? You got your ass han..."
links.text: What happened? You got your ass handed to you. You should have made the gun work! How are you going to get out of this now?

links.title: Authority: "What happened? You got your ass han..."
links.text: What happened? You got your ass handed to you. Always go with the gun! How are you going to get out of this now?

links.title: You: ""I'm not racist! All I care about i..."
links.text: "I'm not racist! All I care about is Revachol and it's people and if some foreigner thinks..."

links.title: Eugene: ""Shit, boss, he actually *is* racis..."
links.text: "Shit, boss, he actually *is* racist!"

links.title: The Gardener: ""Of course he's racist. Look at how..."
links.text: "Of course he's racist. Look at how fat he is."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant turns to you. "Unles..."
links.text: The lieutenant turns to you. "Unless you had questions, we should get some air."

links.title: Authority: "You got shredded to pieces there! S..."
links.text: You got shredded to pieces there! Should've gone with the gun, what were you thinking?!

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Get the fuck out of here, you race..."
links.text: "Get the fuck out of here, you race war asshole. We're not gonna march in your rally, stop trying to recruit us."

links.title: You: ""That's fucking right, no need to h..."
links.text: "That's fucking right, no need to hide anymore -- I'm a proud Revacholian!"

links.title: You: ""I don't even have a gun!""
links.text: "I don't even have a gun!"

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""What are you talking about? Guns a..."
links.text: "What are you talking about? Guns are the only thing you have! Waving them around old ladies' faces. Trying to gun down kids..."

links.title: Eugene: ""Carly said they've been trying to..."
links.text: "Carly said they've been trying to set up a mass execution." He shakes his head in disdain. "Bulk-purchasing guns. Ammunition, too."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""I can believe that." He nods. "Car..."
links.text: "I can believe that." He nods. "Carly works in a gun shop, you see."

links.title: Drama: "Oh my god, The Art -- they're using..."
links.text: Oh my god, The Art -- they're using it against you. This is all a twisted phantasie!

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There's no mass-execution, officer..."
links.text: "There's no mass-execution, officer." He looks at you, concerned. "Just ask questions and don't get sidetracked."

links.title: Authority: "Please don't set up a mass executio..."
links.text: Please don't set up a mass execution. You'll never be able to pull it off. The logistics alone are insane... Just ask questions. Be a normal cop.

links.title: You: ""I haven't harassed any kids!""
links.text: "I haven't harassed any kids!"

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""So you keep saying -- and I do wan..."
links.text: "So you keep saying -- and I do want to believe you, but it's getting harder and harder." He takes a sip. "E, didn't Carly say something?"

links.title: Eugene: ""Yeah, Carly said you've been hangi..."
links.text: "Yeah, Carly said you've been hanging around the day-care centre. In the bushes, man. By the jungle-gym. Tryna' set up some weird field trip to your station, that's in your home..."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""I can believe that. That rings tru..."
links.text: "I can believe that. That rings true to me." He nods. "Carly works in the kindergarten, right?"

links.title: Half Light: "Oh my god, not this again! No! Your..."
links.text: Oh my god, not this again! No! Your cheeks are burning red and you're sweating profusely...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There is no Carly and there is no..."
links.text: "There is no Carly and there is no kindergarten," the lieutenant says to you, concerned you might not get it. "It's a joke and we're getting derailed."

links.title: Authority: "Please stop hanging around the jung..."
links.text: Please stop hanging around the jungle-gym. Whatever you're doing there is making you look awful. And it's not helping you with these guys at all.

links.title: You: ""I'm not shitting myself!""
links.text: "I'm not shitting myself!"

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Of course you are." He takes a sip..."
links.text: "Of course you are." He takes a sip. "E, didn't Carly work in a diaper shop?"

links.title: Eugene: ""Yeah, Carly said you've been hangi..."
links.text: "Yeah, Carly said you've been hanging around the adult diaper shop. Browsing the aisles, too ashamed to ask for assistance."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Now *that* I can believe." He poin..."
links.text: "Now *that* I can believe." He points down. "And then there's the matter of the floor being completely covered in faeces."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes -- shit, faeces, poop -- scato..."
links.text: "Yes -- shit, faeces, poop -- scatological jokes," the lieutenant concludes dryly . "If you don't have anything more to say, then we're going to go back to asking questions."

links.title: Authority: "You don't have to be the butt of ev..."
links.text: You don't have to be the butt of every joke. You're making the lieutenant look bad.

links.title: Authority: "You don't have to be the butt of ev..."
links.text: You don't have to be the butt of every joke. You're making the lieutenant look bad. Just stick to what you know. Guns.

links.title: Authority: "This Carly is a made up person. It'..."
links.text: This Carly is a made up person. It's nothing but a mean joke. They just want to see how you wriggle out of it.

links.title: You: "(Turn to the lieutenant.) "Kim, I n..."
links.text: (Turn to the lieutenant.) "Kim, I need your gun."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why? You have your own gun.""
links.text: "Why? You have your own gun."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why? You have a gun.""
links.text: "Why? You have a gun."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why?""
links.text: "Why?"

links.title: Authority: "This is not what he thinks it is --..."
links.text: This is not what he thinks it is -- this is a great idea.

links.title: Volition: "I'm afraid it's not what *you* thin..."
links.text: I'm afraid it's not what *you* think it is either.

links.title: You: ""What? Who -- me? What is it?""
links.text: "What? Who -- me? What is it?"

links.title: Volition: "Yes -- you. Stop talking out loud,..."
links.text: Yes -- you. Stop talking out loud, you sound like you're unravelling.

links.title: You: ""Everybody calm down! This is only..."
links.text: "Everybody calm down! This is only a demonstration!" (Turn to Kim.) "Kim, the gun. Yours is better. It will make sense."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""What in the name of *fuck* are you..."
links.text: "What in the name of *fuck* are you doing?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But..." The lieutenant looks worri..."
links.text: "But..." The lieutenant looks worried, he whispers: "I don't want to give you my gun. Not after the last time."

links.title: Shanky: ""The fuck is happening, Titus? What..."
links.text: "The fuck is happening, Titus? What are they whispering about?"

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Easy, Shanks..." The leader gestur..."
links.text: "Easy, Shanks..." The leader gestures for him to stand down. "I want to see where this is going."

links.title: You: ""I'm not scared anymore. I know wha..."
links.text: "I'm not scared anymore. I know what I have to do."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Uhm..." He hesitates. "And what *i..."
links.text: "Uhm..." He hesitates. "And what *is* that?"

links.title: Rhetoric: "He does *not* like that phrasing. N..."
links.text: He does *not* like that phrasing. Neither do I.

links.title: You: ""Trust me, Kim. I am merely flesh.""
links.text: "Trust me, Kim. I am merely flesh."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Merely *what*...?" He doesn't quit..."
links.text: "Merely *what*...?" He doesn't quite catch that last word. A brief moment passes in silence, then...

links.title: Half Light: "The pressure in the room grows to a..."
links.text: The pressure in the room grows to a boiling point.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Be careful -- it's loaded." He unh..."
links.text: "Be careful -- it's loaded." He unholsters and gives you his firearm. It feels oddly light and buzzing in your hand. Like a funny toy.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Your fingers wrap around the handle..."
links.text: Your fingers wrap around the handle, the index slides into the trigger loop. Do it. Go on!

links.title: Authority: "Good. Now put it in your mouth."
links.text: Good. Now put it in your mouth.

links.title: You: "But I want to point it at *them*."
links.text: But I want to point it at *them*.

links.title: Authority: "*I want to point it at them*, phah!..."
links.text: *I want to point it at them*, phah! Quit your whining.

links.title: Authority: "*Everyone* knows how to do that! Yo..."
links.text: *Everyone* knows how to do that! You're a special man. You're going to point it at *yourself*. Go ahead, show them.

links.title: You: "Put the barrel in your mouth."
links.text: Put the barrel in your mouth.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What are you doing?!" The short co..."
links.text: "What are you doing?!" The short cold barrel touches your lips. It tastes like iron and hell.

links.title: Half Light: "Genuine panic flies across the lieu..."
links.text: Genuine panic flies across the lieutenant's face.

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Fellas..." The big guy glances ove..."
links.text: "Fellas..." The big guy glances over his shoulders. "You getting any of this?"

links.title: You: ""So, uhm. Behold, the uhm... demons..."
links.text: "So, uhm. Behold, the uhm... demonstration." (Give the gun back, this is getting too scary.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Thank you." He quickly returns the..."
links.text: "Thank you." He quickly returns the gun to his holster, then looks at the room. "So -- questions?"

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Yeah, I have one." The big guy bur..."
links.text: "Yeah, I have one." The big guy bursts out laughing. "What the fuck was that, you nancies?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Nothing. Just a minor misunderstan..."
links.text: "Nothing. Just a minor misunderstanding. Let's return to questions -- officer?"

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "He is grateful to have that gun bac..."
links.text: He is grateful to have that gun back on his belt right now.

links.title: You: ""There is no other way.""
links.text: "There is no other way."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Silence. He tilts his head to the s..."
links.text: Silence. He tilts his head to the side, inspecting you. A brief moment passes, then...

links.title: You: ""I know what I'm doing. It's not my..."
links.text: "I know what I'm doing. It's not my first day on the police-job."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Police job?" He tilts his head to..."
links.text: "Police job?" He tilts his head to the side, as if inspecting you. A brief moment passes. In silence. Then...

links.title: You: ""I want to turn back.""
links.text: "I want to turn back."

links.title: Authority: "There is no 'back'."
links.text: There is no 'back'.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Detective." He thinks of putting h..."
links.text: "Detective." He thinks of putting his hand on your shoulder, then doesn't. "We don't have to demonstrate anything, let's just get back to the questions."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But..." The lieutenant looks worri..."
links.text: "But..." The lieutenant looks worried, he whispers: "I don't want to give you my gun."

links.title: You: ""Everybody calm down! This is only..."
links.text: "Everybody calm down! This is only a demonstration!" (Turn to Kim.) "Kim, the gun please?"

links.title: You: ""I need Kim and his gun here for my..."
links.text: "I need Kim and his gun here for my *demonstration*."

links.title: Shanky: ""The fuck are you talkin' about --..."
links.text: "The fuck are you talkin' about -- gun?" He asks angrily. "No one's gonna let you wave a gun around here."

links.title: You: "That's it? That's all I got?"
links.text: That's it? That's all I got?

links.title: Authority: "Well... The rest of that nancy stuf..."
links.text: Well... The rest of that nancy stuff was really just there to make the gun thing more appealing. But it might work anyway.

links.title: Authority: "Did you already try the gun thing?..."
links.text: Did you already try the gun thing? I hear the gun thing is excellent, and has great results.

links.title: Conceptualization: "You're probably right. The others a..."
links.text: You're probably right. The others are only there for filler -- to make the gun thing *pop*.

links.title: You: ""Kim, I'm only getting total garbag..."
links.text: "Kim, I'm only getting total garbage here." (Whisper) "Please help."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods and turns to ad..."
links.text: The lieutenant nods and turns to address the room: "You know what? You guys *must* be the cops. Because this is what cops do, right?"

links.title: Authority: "He's had enough. He's really gonna..."
links.text: He's had enough. He's really gonna push their buttons now.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Live in a bar. Sit on their fat as..."
links.text: "Live in a bar. Sit on their fat asses like they own the place, while the neighbourhood goes to shit, corpses hang from trees, kids shoot up..."

links.title: Glen: ""Hey, we don't have to fucking take..."
links.text: "Hey, we don't have to fucking take this shit..."

links.title: Elizabeth: ""Glen...""
links.text: "Glen..."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""EVERYONE SHUT UP!!!" Titus's loud..."
links.text: "EVERYONE SHUT UP!!!" Titus's loud baritone echoes back from the mess hall walls and the entire cafeteria falls silent.

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Fuck you man!" his eyes are fixed..."
links.text: "Fuck you man!" his eyes are fixed on Kim. "You didn't see the place before we got here. Fucking... graffito everywhere..."

links.title: You: ""If Kim was here, he would know wha..."
links.text: "If Kim was here, he would know what to say."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""So you wanna go get him or you wan..."
links.text: "So you wanna go get him or you wanna pester Old Titus here with more of your questions?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We'll solve the case. Look at me...."
links.text: "We'll solve the case. Look at me. Don't worry." He appears calm suddenly. "This *demonstration* is not helping. At all."

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "Inside the small mechanism, you can..."
links.text: Inside the small mechanism, you can hear a spring tensing up...

links.title: Alain: ""Yeah, 'cause I sorta *wanna* see t..."
links.text: "Yeah, 'cause I sorta *wanna* see that shit."

links.title: Glen: ""You won't, man. His fucking balls..."
links.text: "You won't, man. His fucking balls ain't big enough!"

links.title: You: ""These are my thoughts. This is my..."
links.text: "These are my thoughts. This is my head."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""What in the name of mother-fuck......"
links.text: "What in the name of mother-fuck..." He looks closer, squinting at you.

links.title: Perception (Taste): "Acidic taste on your lips. Corrosiv..."
links.text: Acidic taste on your lips. Corrosive. Once as a child you put your tongue against the rail. It was winter. That was a long time ago...

links.title: Eugene: ""The fuck is he saying?""
links.text: "The fuck is he saying?"

links.title: Shanky: ""Some insane shit.""
links.text: "Some insane shit."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Nothing. Give me the gun.""
links.text: "Nothing. Give me the gun."

links.title: You: ""You will NEVER forget what happens..."
links.text: "You will NEVER forget what happens in five seconds -- if you don't RESPECT me!"

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Fellas. The cop is really threaten..."
links.text: "Fellas. The cop is really threatening to off himself. This is insane."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. That is not what is happening...."
links.text: "No. That is not what is happening." He turns to you. "This *show* is unnecessary. Give me my gun. Now."

links.title: Rhetoric: "He's desperately trying to offer a..."
links.text: He's desperately trying to offer a counter-narrative. There is none.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "There's just this *itch*, deep unde..."
links.text: There's just this *itch*, deep under your skull, where you've never reached. Never scratched...

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Don't. There's this *itch* in the m..."
links.text: Don't. There's this *itch* in the middle of your skull, where you've never reached. Never scratched...

links.title: You: ""You better get ready to fucking re..."
links.text: "You better get ready to fucking respect me in: five, four, three..."

links.title: Shanky: ""He's not gonna off himself, c'mon!""
links.text: "He's not gonna off himself, c'mon!"

links.title: Theo: ""No," a calm voice from the back of..."
links.text: "No," a calm voice from the back of the room: "He'll do it. Go ahead, son -- three, two..."

links.title: Inland Empire: "*Kisses... kisses... kisses...*"
links.text: *Kisses... kisses... kisses...*

links.title: Volition: "No! Give it to Lieutenant Kitsuragi..."
links.text: No! Give it to Lieutenant Kitsuragi. It's not too late -- you can still spin this as some kind of tactic.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "*Bratan*, we can't have any fun if..."
links.text: *Bratan*, we can't have any fun if you kill yourself. Painting the booth red with your brains sounds like a real blast now -- but what about later? There'll be nothing.

links.title: Authority: "There will be no *spinning*. Do the..."
links.text: There will be no *spinning*. Do the *honest* thing! Pull the trigger!

links.title: Authority: "Two! One! Do it, get this *one* thi..."
links.text: Two! One! Do it, get this *one* thing right.

links.title: You: ""I'm not fucking this case up!" (Fi..."
links.text: "I'm not fucking this case up!" (Finger on the trigger.) "You *will* respect me!"

links.title: You: ""I'm going to kill myself now, you..."
links.text: "I'm going to kill myself now, you fucking whore." (Pull the trigger.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What happened?" the lieutenant hal..."
links.text: "What happened?" the lieutenant half-whispers, "We got absolutely *wiped*. Let's go before it gets worse."

links.title: Authority: "What's going on, are you a racist n..."
links.text: What's going on, are you a racist now? Is the rally real? Please don't set up any rally, it'll make you look awful!

links.title: Volition: "There is no rally, c'mon. Just ask..."
links.text: There is no rally, c'mon. Just ask questions, you need to put this race rally garbage in the rear-view mirror.

links.title: You: "Give the gun back to the lieutenant..."
links.text: Give the gun back to the lieutenant.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Thank you." He returns it to his h..."
links.text: "Thank you." He returns it to his holster, then looks at the room: "Nothing to worry about here, people -- my partner likes to play these jokes. He's what you call *dark*."

links.title: Empathy: "He is infinitely grateful to have t..."
links.text: He is infinitely grateful to have that gun back on his belt right now.

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Dark?" The big guy bursts out laug..."
links.text: "Dark?" The big guy bursts out laughing. "What the fuck was that, you carnies? We haven't seen RCM in four years and *this* shows up!"

links.title: Shanky: ""I knew he wasn't gonna do it, thou..."
links.text: "I knew he wasn't gonna do it, though! I knew he'd pussy out!"

links.title: Theo: ""No, no. I still have my money on h..."
links.text: "No, no. I still have my money on him." The old man pulls on his cigarette, slowly. "Sooner or later -- he has that look."

links.title: You: ""Ha-ha everyone. Did you like my fu..."
links.text: "Ha-ha everyone. Did you like my funny joke?"

links.title: The Gardener: ""Do not think your *failed suicide..."
links.text: "Do not think your *failed suicide attempt* will win you any pity from these men -- do not expect them to forget it soon either."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Again -- it was a dark joke." He t..."
links.text: "Again -- it was a dark joke." He turns to you. "Maybe we should go for a little walk, joker? Before we continue? Jogging around seems to have a positive effect on you."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Yes! Get the serotonine running. Ke..."
links.text: Yes! Get the serotonine running. Keeps those bad thoughts away.

links.title: You: ""Yes. Let's go back to normal. Let'..."
links.text: "Yes. Let's go back to normal. Let's pretend this never happened."

links.title: The Gardener: ""Do not think your *failed suicide..."
links.text: "Do not think your *failed suicide attempt* will win you any pity from these men. Do not expect them to forget it either."

links.title: You: ""The fucking whore left me, I know..."
links.text: "The fucking whore left me, I know it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ehm...""
